com.bigdata.rdf.graph

Interface IGASEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigdataGASEngine, GASEngine, RAMGASEngine, SAILGASEngine

    public interface IGASEngine
    The interface used to submit an IGASProgram for evaluation.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNThreads()
      The parallelism for the SCATTER and GATHER phases.
      boolean getSortFrontier()
      Return true iff the frontier should be sorted.
      <VS,ES,ST> IGASContext<VS,ES,ST> newGASContext(IGraphAccessor graphAccessor, IGASProgram<VS,ES,ST> program)
      Obtain an execution context for the specified IGASProgram.
      void shutdown()
      Polite shutdown.
      void shutdownNow()
      Immediate shutdown.

    • Method Detail

      • newGASContext

        <VS,ES,ST> IGASContext<VS,ES,ST> newGASContext(IGraphAccessor graphAccessor,
                                               IGASProgram<VS,ES,ST> program)
        Obtain an execution context for the specified IGASProgram.
        Type Parameters:
        VS - The generic type for the per-vertex state. This is scoped to the computation of the IGASProgram.
        ES - The generic type for the per-edge state. This is scoped to the computation of the IGASProgram.
        ST - The generic type for the SUM. This is often directly related to the generic type for the per-edge state, but that is not always true. The SUM type is scoped to the GATHER + SUM operation (NOT the computation).
        Parameters:
        graphAccessor - Indicates the graph to be processed.
        program - The program to execute against that graph.

      • getSortFrontier

        boolean getSortFrontier()
        Return true iff the frontier should be sorted. Backends that benefit from an ordered frontier (e.g., to vector IOs) should return true. Backends that do not benefit from an ordered frontier (e.g., a backend based on hash collections in memory) should return false.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Polite shutdown.

      • shutdownNow

        void shutdownNow()
        Immediate shutdown.

      • getNThreads

        int getNThreads()
        The parallelism for the SCATTER and GATHER phases.
